description:
The photo club is doing an Animal Cosplay Cafe for the University Festival. Both Aoi and Miyabi visit the festival, and even Mayu is lending a hand by washing dishes. Things seem to go well - until Tina announces a `special service`...
Everyone is depressed, but Aoi serves a cup of tea for everyone - and photo club president Suzuki has an idea: A traditional Japanese tea ceremony stall, serving Aoi`s tea! But the kimonos everyone will have to wear revive painful memories for Kaoru.
